SigmoidNeuron - Class in com.riskybusiness.neural
     A Neuron that uses the sigmoid function as its activation function.
SigmoidNeuron(float, int) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.SigmoidNeuron
Constructs a SigmoidNeuron with the given summation divisor to use in the activation function, as well as the amount of inputs for the Neuron.
SigmoidNeuron(int) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.SigmoidNeuron
Constructs a SigmoidNeuron with the given amount of inputs for the SigmoidNeuron.
StepNeuron - Class in com.riskybusiness.neural
     A Neuron that uses a step function as its activation function.
StepNeuron(float, int) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.StepNeuron
Constructs a StepNeuron with the given threshold to use in the activation function, as well as the amount of inputs for the Neuron.
StepNeuron(int) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.StepNeuron
Constructs a StepNeuron with the given amount of inputs for the SigmoidNeuron.
sum(float...) - Method in class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron
Sums the list of inputs given.
Synapse - Class in com.riskybusiness.neural
     Describes a connection between two different Neurons.
Synapse(int, Neuron, Neuron) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.Synapse
Constructs a Synapse with the given input index and the sender and receiver.
synapses - Variable in class com.riskybusiness.neural.NeuralNet
Describes all of the Synapses in the network.
